ADDomain.description: Defines the AD domain you’re working with.

LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly.title: Only Sync Local Password on Match

LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncLocalUsers.title: Local Users to Not Sync Password

LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncNetworkUsers.title: Network Users to Not Sync Password

PasswordPolicy.title: Password Policy
PasswordPolicy.description: Complexity policy for changing the password via Kerberos.

minLowerCase.title: Minimum Lowercase Letters
minLowerCase.description: Minimum # of lowercase letters required in password

minUpperCase.title: Minimum Uppercase Letters
minUpperCase.description: Minimum # of uppercase letters required in password

minNumber.title: Minimum Numbers
minNumber.description: Minimum # of numbers required in password

minSymbol.title: Minimum Symbols
minSymbol.description: Minimum # of symbols required in password

minMatches.title: Minimum Password Policy Matches
minMatches.description: Minimum # of password policies that must be met (not including length)

ChangePasswordOptions.title: Change Password Options
ChangePasswordOptions.description: Task, URL or App path for ChangePasswordType. (<<serial>>, <<fullname>>, <<shortname>> and <<domain>> are currently supported as substitutions)

HideExpirationMessage.title: Hide Password Expiration Message
HideExpirationMessage.description: Message text to show in the menu bar when the password countdown has been suppressed.

PasswordExpireAlertTime.title: Password Expiration Alert Time
PasswordExpireAlertTime.description: Number of seconds before a user's password expiration that an alert is shown. (Set to 0 to never be bothered. Defaults to 15 days or 1,296,000 seconds.)

PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime.title: Password Expiration Custom Warning Time
PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime.description: Number of days remaining before the custom alert is shown, and in yellow.

PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime.title: Password Expiration Custom Alert Time
PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime.description: Number of days remaining before the custom alert is shown, and in red.

UPCAlert.title: Unannounced Password Changes Alert
UPCAlert.description: Alerts the user to Unannounced Password Changes, typically when the password was changed in AD and not from the user's system.

MessageUPCAlert.title: Unannounced Password Changes Message
MessageUPCAlert.description: Message to be shown in an UPCAlert notification.

UPCAlertAction.title: Unannounced Password Changes Action
UPCAlertAction.description: Path to a script or other binary to execute when a UPC Alert occurs.

GetCertificateAutomatically.title: Get Certificates Automatically
GetCertificateAutomatically.description: Automatically request a certificate for a user when they don't have a valid certificate in the keychain.

AutoRenewCert.title: Automatic Certificate Renewal
AutoRenewCert.description: Number of days until the certificate expires before automatically renewing it.

ExportableKey.title: Exportable Private Key
ExportableKey.description: Allows the private key from any NoMAD generated certificate to be exported.

CleanCerts.title: Automatic Certificate Cleaning
CleanCerts.description: Automatically remove extra certificates from the user's keychain. This will leave the 2 newest and the 2 oldest certificates.

X509CA.title: Windows Certificate Authority
X509CA.description: FQDN of the Windows web CA for NoMAD to use for certificates.

Template.title: Windows Certificate Authority Template
Template.description: Certificate template to request when using the Windows CA.

WifiNetworks.title: Wi-Fi Networks
WifiNetworks.description: A list of wireless networks that the certificate created by NoMAD should be associated with.

LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing.title: Hide NoMAD Menubar Icon
LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing.description: Removes the icon from the menu bar. Note that NoMAD still is in the menu bar, just with no icon and taking up less space.

MountSharesWithFinder.title: Mount Shares with Finder
MountSharesWithFinder.description: Use the Finder instead of the API for automounted file shares.

GetHelpOptions.title: Get Help Options
GetHelpOptions.description: URL or Path for GetHelpType (<<serial>>, <<fullname>>, <<shortname>> and <<domain>> are currently supported as substitutions)

SelfServicePath.title: Self Service Path
SelfServicePath.description: File path for a Self Service application not found automatically.

HideGetSoftware.title: Hide 'Get Software' Menu Item
HideGetSoftware.description: Hides the Get Software menu item.

HideHelp.title: Hide 'Help' Menu Item
HideHelp.description: Hides the Get Help menu item.

ShowHome.title: Show 'Home' Menu Item
ShowHome.description: Shows the Home Directory share menu item.

HideLockScreen.title: Hide 'Lock Screen' Menu Item
HideLockScreen.description: Hides the Lock Screen menu item.

HideRenew.title: Hide 'Renew Tickets' Menu Item
HideRenew.description: Hides the Renew Tickets menu item.

HideSignOut.title: Hide 'Sign Out' Menu Item
HideSignOut.description: Hides the Sign Out menu item.

PersistExpiration.title: Persist Password Expiration Countdown
PersistExpiration.description: Shows the password expiration countdown even when the user is not logged into the domain.

MessageNotConnected.title: Not Connected to Domain Message
MessageNotConnected.description: Message text to show in the menu bar when NoMAD is not connected to the AD domain.

MessagePasswordChangePolicy.title: Password Change Policy Message
MessagePasswordChangePolicy.description: Message text to display in the password change dialog to help the user understand how complex they need to be.

MessageLocalSync.title: Local Password Sync Message
MessageLocalSync.description: Message text for when a user is asked for their local password to sync their network password to their local account.

MenuAbout.title: 'About' Menu Item Text
MenuAbout.description: Menu item text for the About item.

MenuChangePassword.title: 'Change Password' Menu Item Text
MenuChangePassword.description: Menu item text for the Change Password item.

MenuFileServers.title: 'File Servers' Menu Item Text
MenuFileServers.description: Menu item text for the File Servers item.

MenuGetCertificate.title: 'Get Certificate' Menu Item Text
MenuGetCertificate.description: Menu item text for the Get Certificate item.

MenuGetSoftware.title: 'Get Software' Menu Item Text
MenuGetSoftware.description: Menu item text for the Get Software item.

MenuGetHelp.title: 'Get Help' Menu Item Text
MenuGetHelp.description: Menu item text for the Get Help item.

MenuHomeDirectory.title: 'Home Directory' Menu Item Text
MenuHomeDirectory.description: Menu item text for the Home Directory item.

MenuRenewTickets.title: 'Renew Tickets' Menu Item Text
MenuRenewTickets.description: Menu item text for the Renew Tickets item.

MenuUserName.title: Username Menu Item Text
MenuUserName.description: Menu item text for the user name item before a user logs in.

MenuPasswordExpires.title: Password Expiration Menu Item Text
MenuPasswordExpires.description: Menu item text for the password expiration item before a user logs in.

CaribouTime.title: Carrie the Caribou Icons
CaribouTime.description: Changes the icon set to Carrie the Caribou.

IconOn.title: NoMAD Connected Icon
IconOn.description: Path to a 16x16 pixel image to use as the icon in the menu bar when NoMAD is connected.

IconOff.title: NoMAD Disconnected Icon
IconOff.description: Path to a 16x16 pixel image to use as the icon in the menu bar when NoMAD is not connected.

IconOnDark.title: NoMAD Connected Dark Icon
IconOnDark.description: Path to a 16x16 pixel image to use as the icon in the menu bar when NoMAD is connected in dark mode.

IconOffDark.title: NoMAD Disconnected Dark Icon
IconOffDark.description: Path to a 16x16 pixel image to use as the icon in the menu bar when NoMAD is not connected in dark mode.

LoginItem.title: NoMAD Login Item
LoginItem.description: Adds NoMAD to the user's start up items.

SignInCommand.title: Post Sign In Command
SignInCommand.description: Path to a script or command to be run after a successful sign in.

SignOutCommand.title: Post Sign Out Command
SignOutCommand.description: Path to a script or other binary to be run on sign out.

StateChangeAction.title: Network Change Action
StateChangeAction.description: Path to a script that will be launched on network changes.

AutoConfigure.title: Auto Configuration Scheme
AutoConfigure.description: Keyword to determine what auto configuration scheme to use.

DontShowWelcome.title: Don't Show NoMAD Welcome Window
DontShowWelcome.description: Hides the Welcome window on first launch.

DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn.title: Don't Show Again Welcome Window Checkbox
DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn.description: Shows the Welcome Screen, but checks the "Don't show again" box by default. Useful for when you want to show the Welcome screen only once.

MenuWelcome.title: Custom Welcome Window Path
MenuWelcome.description: Path to a folder containing an index.html file and associated resources for displaying as a Welcome window.

SignInWindowOnLaunch.title: Show Sign In Window on Launch
SignInWindowOnLaunch.description: Shows the Sign In window on launch.

UseKeychainPrompt.title: Sign In Window Keychain
UseKeychainPrompt.description: Shows the Sign In window on launch unless the user has a password in the keychain.

SignInWindowAlert.title: Force Sign In Window on Top
SignInWindowAlert.description: Makes the Sign In window the foremost window when a user is not signed in.

SignInWindowAlertTime.title: Force Sign In Window on Top Timer
SignInWindowAlertTime.description: Time in seconds between the SignInWindowAlert making the Sign In window the foremost window.

TitleSignIn.title: Sign In Window Title
TitleSignIn.description: Title of the Sign In window.

SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions.title: Sign In Window User Exclusions
SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions.description: Local users that will not be shown the Sign In window automatically.
